synopsis.text:
What's it like to journey through time and meet history's greatest scientific minds? Join Mari Hayase, the adventurous daughter of a missing scientist, as she embarks on an electrifying quest to find her father and uncover groundbreaking discoveries in magnetism and electricity. Armed with her father's enigmatic armillary compass and a mysterious book, Mari is transported back in time with her best friend, Waka Mizuki, and Waka's brother, Shun.

Based on the 1983 book "Jishaku to Denki no Hatsumei Hakken Monogatari" by Japanese educator Kiyonobu Itakura, Time Travel Shoujo is part of the Hatsumei Hakken Monogatari Zenshuu series, which recounts the stories behind various scientific discoveries and inventions throughout history. This thrilling anime adaptation focuses on the transformative developments in magnetism and electricity.

Throughout her journey, Mari encounters legendary scientists and inventors, such as Benjamin Franklin, Alexander Graham Bell, and Thomas Edison. As she navigates the past, Mari must be cautious not to get stuck in time. Will she find her missing father and unlock the secrets of these revolutionary discoveries? Only time will tell!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
